column1: '''Learn now the lore of Living Creatures!''' is a poem-list spoken by [[Treebeard]] to [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Merry]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] in "[[Treebeard (chapter)|Treebeard]]". The list seems to be very ancient
column2: as Treebeard said he had learned it when he was young.

column1: Learn now the lore of Living Creatures!
The list is said to be very long
column2: and it is certain that Treebeard skipped many of the verses. Merry and Pippin suggested to him the addition of another line to go along:
